title: ARAM bugg : Rammus
body:
When Rammus uses "marking" on a target and uses his Q before he teleports to the target he will stay for more than 5 seconds in the  air...
Why is that so?

replies.body:
Hey,

we're the german community - i think it's better if u post it in the right forum: http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/
